name: Plot
description: Export a chart based on the crosstab projection.

properties.name: plot.width
properties.description: Plot width (pixels). If left empty, crosstab dimensions will be used.

properties.name: plot.height
properties.description: Plot height (pixels). If left empty, crosstab dimensions will be used.

properties.name: x_range
properties.description: X axis range. If empty (default), will use the data's range. If customise, must be provided as a comma-separated list of values (e.g. '0, 10'). One of the two values can be set to NA to use the lower or upper limit of the data.

properties.name: y_range
properties.description: Y axis range. If empty (default), will use the data's range. If customise, must be provided as a comma-separated list of values (e.g. '0, 10'). One of the two values can be set to NA to use the lower or upper limit of the data.

properties.name: bar.position
properties.description: Bar position - any of dodge, stack or fill.

properties.name: rotate_x_axis
properties.description: Rotates the x axis labels by a 90 degrees angle.

properties.name: wrap.1d
properties.description: Wraps a 1d sequence of panels into 2d if no row or column factor is specified.

properties.name: flip
properties.description: Whether to flip x and y axes.

properties.name: split_cells
properties.description: Whether to produce one plot per cell or not. Plots will be output as a zip file.

properties.name: heatmap_annotation
properties.description: Add axes labels on a heatmap based on row and columns factors.
